long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price Comparison & Retailer Pinpointing

Overview

With a single click, compare and pinpoint the best product price between fashion retailers for the exact item that you’re browsing in real-time and for FREE!

Take the time and hassle out of the fashion price comparison process by:

   > Instantly compare real time prices between retailers for exact items without leaving your page
   > Add the product to your wishlist once and have all retailers within the EFFORTLIST network watched for a new lowest price
   > Build one wish list and cut back on email subscriptions
   > Avoid overpaying for items - we’re talking about saving you money!

EFFORTLIST allows you to maximise your online shopping budget without cutting back on your favourite brands AND saves you time! Add to Chrome to shop the best product prices with a single click.

When EFFORTLIST compares retailer prices, it pinpoints where the best product price is so you don’t have to undertake any further research or comparisons - we take care of the heavy lifting! 

How does it work?

   1. Download EFFORTLIST - Click ‘Add to Chrome’ and install in your browser
   2. Create an EFFORTLIST account
Online browse as normal and when you find a product you’d like to compare prices on, click the ‘EL’ EFFORTLIST extension
   3. EFFORTLIST will compare the retailers on the network to identify where you can shop the best product price for the exact item 
   4. Click ‘View’ to open the best priced retailer in a new tab, or;
   5. Click the heart button to add to your wishlist to be notified of a new lowest price or to shop later

Download the EFFORTLIST extension now to find your item once and compare prices with a single click in our beta release
